```
services:
  db:
    image: redis:latest
    container_name: redis
    ports:
      - '6379:6379'
    networks:
      - network-example

networks:
  network-example:
    external: true
```

```
services:
  my_app:
    image: "web-app:latest"
    container_name: web-app
    ports:
      - "8080:8080"
    networks:
      - network-example

networks:
  network-example:
    external: true
```

```
services:
  db:
    image: redis:latest
    container_name: redis
    ports:
      - '6379:6379'
    networks:
      - network

networks:
  network:
    driver: bridge
    name: redis_network
```

```
services:
  my_app:
    image: "web-app:latest"
    container_name: web-app
    ports:
      - "8080:8080"
    networks:
      - my-app

networks:
  my-app:
    name: redis_network
    external: true
```

```
docker-compose -f docker-compose-redis-service.yaml up -d && docker-compose -f docker-compose-my-app-service.yaml up -d
```
